advertiser_name: Kevin R Westmoreland Trucking Co., Inc.
ad_text: Kevin R Westmoreland Trucking Co., Inc. Sponsored CDL Drivers Needed Hauling Gravel Sand Dirt Report to Cartersville Daily for work and daily routes. Routes include Metro Atlanta and the surrounding areas. Typical work hours are Monday-Friday 6 a.m. to 5 or 6 p.m. with occasional Saturday work. Must have CDL and Clean MVR. Must be Dependable, Drug-Free and Career Driven. Vacation,Holiday,Health Insurance,Dental,Vision,Life insurance,IRA,Bonuses Located in Cartersville Please Contact Kevin 770-877-2557 [Email hidden] FULL-TIME · EMERSON, GEORGIA Dump Truck Driver Apply now
